navigation.title: Information system for recording student attendace

loginPage.headerTitle: Enter your identification number and password and choose role to login.

professorPage.assistant_selection: Choose assistant who will be responsible for exercises (or choose none)
professorPage.study: Choose studies that will take this course (choose by year of study)

assistantPage.schoolYearOver: You have no students enrolled or School year is over. Please wait for professor to start new school year.

registrationPage.headerTitle: Please complete form below to register.
registrationPage.csvMessage: Select .csv file for automatic staff registration
registrationPage.csvAllSuccessfull: All CSV file data imported successfully.

errors.wrong_nS: Input format for "Name and surname" field is invalid (correct example: John Smith).
errors.wrong_pass: Input format for "Password" field or password itself is invalid. Password must include at least one uppercase, one lowercase, and one number.
errors.wrong_email: Input format for "University Email" field is invalid. Please enter valid university email (ending with: @universityMail.rs).
errors.notSelected_registerAs: You haven't selected whether you wanna register as Professor or Assistant.
errors.invalid_captcha: Captcha text doesn't match image text.
errors.wrong_id: Your identification number is either incorrect or not existant. Please check again.
errors.wrong_indexNo: Input format for "Index number" field is invalid (correct example: 2020/123456).
errors.deleteError: Internal server error while trying to delete user.
errors.notAtAdminPanel: To login as Administrator please use "Administrator Panel".
errors.wrong_sN: Input format for "Subject name" is invalid. It must be formated as (.../...).
errors.did_not_selected_any_study: You must select at least one study that is taking this course.
errors.addSubjectError: Internal server error while trying to add new subject. Contact administrator or try again later.
errors.switchRoleError0: Internal server error while trying to switch role. Contact administrator or try again later.
errors.switchRoleError2: because he/she has subject(s) assigned to him/her.
errors.editSubjectError: Internal server error while trying to edit subject. Contact administrator or try again later.
errors.edit_wrong_sN0: Wrong or empty original subject name
errors.edit_wrong_sN1: Wrong or empty english subject name
errors.viewAttendingStudentsError: Internal server error while trying to view attending subjects. Contact administrator or try again later.
errors.startCSYError: Internal server error while trying to start new subject year. Contact administrator or try again later.
errors.endCSYError: Internal server error while trying to end current subject year. Contact administrator or try again later.
errors.getLEInfoError: Internal server error while trying to get lecture/exercise info. Contact administrator or try again later.
errors.viewLEError: Internal server error while trying to view lectures/exercises. Contact administrator or try again later.
errors.LELengthInvalid: Invalid lecture/exercise time slot. It must last from 45 minutes up to 6 hours.
errors.startLEError: Internal server error while trying to add new lecture/exercise. Contact administrator or try again later.
errors.csvInvalidUsers: CSV file data partially imported. Invalid rows contain following email addresses:
errors.graphNotGenerated: No log files found. Graph could not be generated.
